title: Evidence-Backed Treatments
tagline: Clinical outcomes you can read before you choose.
description: Summaries of peer-reviewed studies covering our core regenerative therapies.
longDescription: These articles condense the clinical evidence that guides how we deliver fat-derived stem cell therapy, BMAC, PRP joint treatment, and the P-Shot. Each summary notes study design, follow-up length, and functional outcomes so you know what was measured and what patients experienced.

hero.headline: See the Studies Behind Our Treatments
hero.subheadline: Peer-reviewed research on regenerative joint and sexual health therapies.

introduction.title: Transparent, Concise, Clinically Relevant
introduction.content: We read the full papers so you can grasp the essentials quickly: who was studied, how outcomes were measured, and what improvements were seen. Each summary links directly to the therapy pathway we offer at the clinic.

fat-derived-stem-cell-joint-therapy.title: Fat Derived Stem Cell Joint Therapy
fat-derived-stem-cell-joint-therapy.shortDescription: Mesenchymal stem cell injections for knee osteoarthritis with multi-year follow-up.
fat-derived-stem-cell-joint-therapy.description: Prospective and randomized trials show stromal vascular fraction and culture-expanded adipose MSCs improve pain and function versus placebo or hyaluronic acid.
benefits: Improvements in WOMAC and MRI scores

bmac-therapy.title: BMAC Therapy
bmac-therapy.shortDescription: Bone marrow concentrate for advanced cartilage and subchondral changes.
bmac-therapy.description: Randomized and long-term cohort studies report pain and function gains up to 15 years, delaying arthroplasty in many patients.

p-shot.title: P-Shot
p-shot.shortDescription: Platelet-rich plasma for erectile function and penile tissue repair.
p-shot.description: Double-blind trials and regenerative medicine reviews show PRP can improve IIEF scores and vascular parameters in vasculogenic ED.

prp-joint-treatment.title: PRP Joint Treatment
prp-joint-treatment.shortDescription: Platelet-rich plasma injections for joint pain and tendon healing.
prp-joint-treatment.description: Multiple randomized trials demonstrate PRP outperforms hyaluronic acid and corticosteroid for sustained pain relief in knee osteoarthritis.
